results.title: Harrison.ai | Medical imaging AI tools
results.meta_description: Reimagining the future of healthcare with AI Get started Trusted by leading public and private healthcare providers around the world. Raising the standard of care. We’re empowering clinicians with next-generation

h1: Reimagining the future of healthcare with AI

Raising the standard of care. We’re empowering clinicians with next-generation medical imaging AI tools, so that no patient’s outcome hinges on the capacity limits of the healthcare system. 3,500 clinicians at over 1,000 sites across four continents are using our AI solutions as assistive tools to diagnose and treat patients faster, and raise the standard of care for patients.
h2: Trusted by leading public and private healthcare providers globally.
Unlock clinical and operational benefits across the clinical workflow with award-winning Al tools.
Supporting faster time to diagnosis and treatment.
Accelerate cancer care. Find the urgent needle in the non-urgent haystack. Explore use cases.
Announcement: The latest frontier in radiology-specific foundational models is now publicly available for research use.
Discover how leading healthcare providers drive better patient care.

paragraphs: Book a demo at ECR 2026. Book Now →
We’re empowering clinicians with next-generation medical imaging AI tools, so that no patient’s outcome hinges on the capacity limits of the healthcare system.
3,500 clinicians at over 1,000 sites across four continents are using our AI solutions as assistive tools to diagnose and treat patients faster, and raise the standard of care for patients.
A comprehensive decision-support AI solution for non-contrast head CT studies, that detects up to 130 findings in under 90 seconds.
A comprehensive decision-support AI solution for chest X-rays, that detects up to 124 findings in under 20 seconds.
A comprehensive decision-support solution for chest CT, that detects up to 167 radiological features.
1,000+ sites across four continents use our AI solutions.

Disclaimer: The information on this website is intended exclusively for the use of healthcare professionals. The products displayed on this website are not available for purchase by the general public and are intended for professional use only.

results.full_text: Harrison.ai | Medical imaging AI tools Skip to content Javascript must be enabled for the correct page display Unlocking infinite medical capacity. Book a demo at ECR 2026. Book Now → Products Radiology Solutions CT Brain Chest X-ray CT Chest Solutions by organisation Public Hospital Private Hospital Private Radiology Provider by use case Oncology Management Emergency and Acute Care Resources Case Studies Evidence Podcast Webinars Guides Blogs Radiology Foundation Model Company About Us Life at Harrison.ai Careers Newsroom Contact Australia Global USA Book a demo Reimagining the future of healthcare with AI Get started Trusted by leading public and private healthcare providers globally. Raising the standard of care. We’re empowering clinicians with next-generation medical imaging AI tools, so that no patient’s outcome hinges on the capacity limits of the healthcare system. 3,500 clinicians at over 1,000 sites across four continents are using our AI solutions as assistive tools to diagnose and treat patients faster, and raise the standard of care for patients. Unlock clinical and operational benefits across the clinical workflow with award-winning Al tools. Supporting faster time to diagnosis and treatment. Quickly identify patients ‘flagged’ in the worklist for prioritised diagnostic and treatment pathways. Catch more. Miss less. Improve diagnostic accuracy with clinical decision-support AI tools, providing clinicians with a second pair of eyes for subtle and complex cases. Improve efficiency and productivity. Leverage AI features for faster radiology turnaround times and more efficient radiology workflows. Discover our award-winning radiology solutions. HARRISON.AI CT BRAIN HARRISON.AI CHEST X-RAY HARRISON.AI CT CHEST HARRISON.AI CT BRAIN A comprehensive decision-support AI solution for non-contrast head CT studies, that detects up to 130 findings in under 90 seconds. HARRISON.AI CHEST X-RAY A comprehensive decision-support AI solution for chest X-rays, that detects up to 124 findings in under 20 seconds. Explore the products Product images are stylised; may differ slightly from actual product UI. HARRISON.AI CT CHEST A comprehensive decision-support solution for chest CT, that detects up to 167 radiological features. Discover CT Chest Product images are stylised; may differ slightly from actual product UI. Not all features are available in all regions. Accelerate cancer care. Find the urgent needle in the non-urgent haystack. Explore use cases. Emergency and acute care Find out more Public hospitals Find out more Oncology management Find out more Private hospitals Find out more Teleradiology Find out more Incidental detection Chronic disease management “The adoption of AI holds immense promise for revolutionising the way we deliver healthcare services to our patients. It not only enhances efficiency but also elevates diagnostic accuracy to unprecedented levels.” Dr. Seow Vei Ken Chief Executive Officer “Harrison.ai Chest X-ray provides a critical safeguard, ensuring no detail is overlooked in our mission to save lives.” Dr. Siavash Es’haghi, Director and Radiologist “It is ultimately helping us diagnose issues at the very earliest opportunity and provide earlier treatment and improved health outcomes.” Clare Butt Advanced Practitioner in Radiology “We can analyse CT brain scans with exceptional accuracy, identifying potential abnormalities and highlighting them to radiologists within 10 minutes. This rapid turnaround time is a game-changer for patients with urgent medical needs.” Dr. Arun Kumar Govindarajan Executive Director & Radiologist “We’re confident that this solution leads in its category for its comprehensive capabilities.” Dr. Julian Adler CEO “This technology will enhance diagnostic accuracy, and efficiency, ultimately revolutionising patient care.” Dr Phil Lucas Lumus Imaging Group Executive Announcement: The latest frontier in radiology-specific foundational models is now publicly available for research use. Access now Discover how leading healthcare providers drive better patient care. 1,000+ sites across four continents use our AI solutions. >35% Of all CXRs in NHS England now processed with Harrison CXR. 100% Of public Accident & Emergency departments in Hong Kong now use Harrison.ai. $240M In funding, backed by leading global investors. 40+ Countries have clearance for clinical use of Harrison.ai solutions. +50% Of radiologists in Australia now have access to Harrison CXR. >130 Hospitals in UK across 45+ NHS Trusts now use Harrison.ai. >35% Of all CXRs in NHS England now processed with Harrison CXR. 100% Of public Accident & Emergency departments in Hong Kong now use Harrison.ai. $240M In funding, backed by leading global investors. 40+ Countries have clearance for clinical use of Harrison.ai solutions. +50% Of radiologists in Australia now have access to Harrison CXR. 130 Hospitals in UK across 45+ NHS Trusts now use Harrison.ai. results.title: Automated Driving Tooling and Embedded Solutions - aiMotive
results.meta_description: With our tools and solutions, automotive partners accelerate development, cut costs, and lead in ADAS and automated driving innovation.

h1: We enable OEMs to deliver scalable solutions from concept to production – faster, better,  and more efficiently
h2: Automated Driving Tooling and Embedded Solutions
Scalable Automated Driving and Next-Generation Simulation at CES 2026
aiMotive and LG to unveil advanced integrated IVI/ADAS controller at CES 2026
AI-powered Data Virtualization Comes to Japan
Scalable Automated Driving and Next-Generation Simulation at CES 2026
aiMotive and LG to unveil advanced integrated IVI/ADAS controller at CES 2026
AI-powered Data Virtualization Comes to Japan
Scalable Automated Driving and Next-Generation Simulation at CES 2026
aiMotive and LG to unveil advanced integrated IVI/ADAS controller at CES 2026
AI-powered Data Virtualization Comes to Japan

paragraphs: Pioneering Next-Gen AutoGI for ADAS/AD Simulation
L2 to L4 ADAS and automated driving features utilizing only radar and cameras without the need for an HD map.
The latest generation of our simulation tool with flexible neural simulation and advanced lighting simulation capabilities.
Fully automated data pipeline to accelerate the development of ADAS/AD features
Our most powerful automotive NPU yet. Now with bit-accurate, faster-than-real-time cloud emulation for scalable ADAS CI/CD testing.

With our tooling and embedded solutions, our automotive partners can accelerate their development time and reduce costs so they can become leaders in ADAS and AD-related experience. Our vision has not changed since our foundation: we would like to enable everyone to enjoy the benefits of automated driving.
aiMotive technology supercharges Stellantis' mid-term development of STLA AutoDrive, the company’s autonomous driving tech platform
Successfully closed evaluation projects with 5+ customers, including OEMs and Tier1s – first production programs underway
A deep understanding of the synergies between HW and SW makes our portfolio scalable and unique in the automotive industry

Since day one, we have looked at driving automation as a complex problem and worked on a holistic solution, instead of specializing in one isolated area. This holistic approach tackles both the tooling and the embedded solutions challenges of automated driving. Our expertise is in the combination of these pillars, making autonomous driving a reality. aiMotive's market-ready products enable our partners to quickly deploy affordable advanced ADAS and automated driving solutions.
Enthusiastic colleagues
Million scenarios run
Total funding (million USD)
Successful partner projects

Since day one, we have looked at driving automation as a complex problem and worked on a holistic solution, instead of specializing in one isolated area. This holistic approach tackles both the tooling and the embedded solutions challenges of automated driving. Our expertise is in the combination of these pillars, making autonomous driving a reality. aiMotive's market-ready products enable our partners to quickly deploy affordable advanced ADAS and AD solutions.
News, blogposts & more about aiMotive
Introducing the world’s first real-time, hyper-realistic neural simulation enabled by aiSim connected to LGE’s HPC running aiMotive’s aiDrive automated driving software in a closed-loop.

aiMotive, a leading developer of advanced artificial intelligence and automated driving software, in collaboration with LG, will introduce a next-generation High-Performing Computing (HPC) Lite platform at CES 2026.

aiMotive, a leading provider of advanced automotive AI technologies, has partnered with its Japanese distributor, Macnica, to introduce a new data collection & processing environment powered by the aiData Platform.

results.title: Synergon AI
results.meta_description: AI-Powered Transformation for Healthcare, Hospitality, Transportation & Technology
paragraphs: Leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies to deliver powerful solutions
Discover how our AI-powered solutions can transform your business operations and drive growth.

Streamline and simplify your business processes. Our workflow automation services use intelligent software and AI algorithms to handle repetitive tasks and complex procedures with minimal human intervention.

Enhance customer service with conversational AI agents. Our AI chatbots engage users in natural, human-like conversations to answer questions, assist with services, and provide support around the clock.

Implement voice-driven interfaces for hands-free convenience. AI voice assistants can interact with users through spoken language – think of it like having a smart Alexa or Siri dedicated to your business.
Accelerate your growth with intelligent sales and marketing tools. We apply AI to automate and optimize your outreach, from lead generation to customer retention.
Discover how AI can transform your business operations
Access our collection of AI resources and guides
Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
Synergon AI, Bangalore, India
